title: Bill Polian on Team Building & Core Traits Needed in a QB
itunes:title: Bill Polian on Team Building & Core Traits Needed in a QB
description:
Bucky Brooks is back with a new episode. He is joined by NFL Hall of Fame Executive Bill Polian, as he talks about team building philosophies, what traits are needed in various key positions, discusses building a team with a young QB and much more (:48).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
